request.description:
Logs in to the NGINX Controller platform and returns the user account's authentication cookie.

The session ID is returned in an authentication cookie named `session`. You must include this session ID in the request header for all subsequent requests to authenticate to the platform.

response.name: Bad input parameter, or possibly a bad URI. Check the input for typos and try again.
Successfully authenticated.
The request cannot be processed because of an internal server error.
Wrong username and/or password.
